title: Honor 4
body: So a bit of a problem, I got honor 3 almost as soon as it came out. I then expected to get honor 4 as well, but no luck. I have been playing for about 1-3 hours a day, honoring people every game, and I don't suspect I get reported. People seem to have gotten honor 5 easily, but I'm stuck.

replies.body: Everyone is going to progress through the Honor Ranks at a different pace simply because they play a different amount of games and get a different amount of honors in each game. Some may have ranked up faster because they played more games every day, others might have been getting honored 4 times in every match.
